website_summaries.verdict: Thick fabric makes them perfect for colder weather.
pros: Heavy material means you don't need to worry about accidental peek-a-boos or wearing a bulky winter coat to run from the car into the studio
Reviewers love that these stay up and cover the tummy, even in odd poses
Many reviewers say that while they are form-fitting, they don't feel constricting
cons: Pants tend to run a bit long, but most say it's not a dealbreaker

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Love! Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Previously bought 90 degree brand leggings (which are also wonderful); however these seem a little thicker (less chance of seeing-through when bending over) and chance of wearing out with multiple washes seems less as well... the waist band is GREAT for tucking in the extra flab ;) -- I am 5'4" and about 200lbs, the Large fits perfect... (my body build is more like 175lbs)... the length is a bit long, but by no means a deal breaker... love the ancles (as well as te calf part on the Capri style); they are not too tight, perfect!!! 5-stars, and I paid full price, no compensation for my review!
customer_reviews.author: Emvee

customer_reviews.title: So perfect!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I came across these on Prime Day. I bought a L and XL. After trying on the L, I didn't bother with the XL as it was a perfect fit. Way better than the $38 high waist leggings I got from the Target Champion line. No problem with the length either and the pocket in front is perfect! I am 5'7 and weigh 182lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Maxime

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, high waist exercise pants
customer_reviews.text: These pants are awesome! They fit perfectly. Very thick material and high waisted as advertised! I ordered an XL and being a size 16 it fits well! I'm going to be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I have two different pairs of these - black and grey. I love them both! They hold in my thighs so they don't jiggle and they fit like a glove, the waistline is exactly the height I wanted. I've had the black ones for 3 years and the grey ones for 2 years, both are in good condition despite being used about 5 days a week 8 months of the year (I wear shorts for my workouts in the warmer months). The black ones are just barely starting to fray at the inseams and outer seams but I think that's pretty darned good after 3 years of constant use!
customer_reviews.author: Kimmer

customer_reviews.title: Fit well and stay up!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I bought these! Being 5'10" and a size 14, I was worried these would be too short and fit like capris or that they'd fit much smaller than expected, but the Large fit perfectly. They stay up and aren't so tight I feel like I'm wearing Spanx, like some cheapo leggings can be. I wear them to run and never have to worry about pulling them up like several other pairs of leggings I have. These were a great purchase! (The white-ish dots on the photo are not on the pants - that's my old crappy mirror!)
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: VERY SEE THROUGH AND CHEAPLY MADE.
customer_reviews.text: I am very disapointed. I love this brands long leggings I have about three pair. However, these shorter ones are not the same thing and are VERY see through. Very cheaply made. Now everytime i bend over everyone can see my ass and everything else. Now I have to pay for a pair of leggings I cannot wear unless my intention is for everyone to see what panties I decided to wear today.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Marie

customer_reviews.title: Dana review
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'7" and weigh about 190. After trying many pants of this type, I was finally able to get the size right and ordered an XXL (which is hard to find) and liked the fit so much I ordered 2 more from this company in the capri style. The fabric is a good weight and I particularly like the charcoal color as the black is nice too but a little bit shinny. I do recommend these pants.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Review

customer_reviews.title: These are probably my favorite legging by far
customer_reviews.text: These are probably my favorite legging by far. They are extremely comfortable and flattering. I am pretty short so the only negative is that they are a little long but doesnt bother me too much. If they had these in a petite they would be perfect. I plan to order more colors. High quality leggings for a low price! :). Good for someone who has a small waist and big bum. Thanks Baleaf! :) I am 4' 11 and weigh about 127 lbs and I got a size small.
customer_reviews.author: Jaz

customer_reviews.title: Ballad Waist High Yoga Pants
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'7" and weigh 125 lbs. I ordered a large because I prefer a relaxed fit and wanted to be sure pants were long enough. These pants are excellent quality. Not too thin and could be worn for weekend run abouts. I got the fit I wanted, good length, not baggy but not skin tight. I expect if you are petite or want that tighter fit these pants would be true to size. I plan to order a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Ozelee

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been on the hunt for leggings with a good fit. I ordered Gym Shark, Cute Booties, etc, but they were not flattering. My fav is Lulu, but they are pricey, so I was trying to find something more affordable. These, however, are very flattering on my figure!! I ordered a small. I'm 5' 6", about 134 pounds, very athletic build, my waist is 27.5 and my hips are 26.5. They look so cute with a crop top, and I feel so comfortable lifting in these. They are comparable to my lulu lemons. I'm surprised the fabric is such good quality. I give these leggings 5 stars all the way! So flattering!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: non see-through fabric my ass!!
customer_reviews.text: Not see-through my ass!!! I am wearing dark grey/dark navy colored AE stripped panties and you can clearly see them!!! I ordered the black pair of these leggings, they fit well and are super comfy...but I CANNOT wear these to my circuit training class because you can clearly see my panties straight through them without even bending over. I am disappointed because these said they were "non see-through fabric". What a rip off for the price. Very upset, just not upset enough to go through the hassle of returning them. I'll have to wear shorts over them...which I was trying to prevent :/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I read in the reviews about the unflattering waist band but with so many great reviews I ignored it. Turns out that the waistband is poorly constructed and is tighter at the bottom giving an unflattering shape to the person wearing it. It also comes up too high so isn't comfortable to work out in. I sent it back the same day and will stay away from that brand. I wonder how it got so many great reviews.
customer_reviews.author: I-lean

customer_reviews.title: Gray ripped :(
customer_reviews.text: I got the baleaf long black leggings and a baleaf bra and loved them and they were awesome. I got these in the gray and it's a softer "terry" material and it ripped the second time I wore them!!! I'm so sad because the black is a really nice thick material but I like the gray color but not it ripping after 1 wear!!! (For reference I got a pretty reasonable size I think I'm 5'8" and 180 lbs so I got extra large.)
customer_reviews.author: ruby red

customer_reviews.title: Waist cuts in
customer_reviews.text: The first time I ordered these I got a medium based on the size chart. They were really tight around the waist and ankles so I got a large. The large has the same problems. There is an additional elastic band around the top of the waist that’s thin, cuts in, and it’s really uncomfortable. For context, I’m 5’7”, 145, lean build. There are equally flattering leggings at this price point that are much more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Sam R

customer_reviews.title: Great until...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Baleaf pant that I’ve purchased, and I love the fact that both pairs of pants fit exactly the same. For the price, I had hoped to get something that would last but after only two months two holes (pencil eraser sized) have appeared in the inseam. Pretty disappointed that I spent this much to have them last only two months without getting holes.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Failed the Bend Over and Check in the Mirror Test
customer_reviews.text: Despite the reviews - these are see through :( I held them up to the light before I even tried them on...and knew they would be. Put them on, and yep - see through. Either they have changed what material they are using - or all the previous posters didn't do the bend over test. However, they did fit as expected. But little good does that do me if people can see my panties!
customer_reviews.author: s&e

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, but...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They really can't be seen through which sadly is a rarity with yoga pants. The tummy support is also well done. My only complaint (taking one star away) is that the crotch seam is very... "Vertical" (translation: camel-toe prone). So if you pull them up to get that tummy support, you end up with a severe line splitting right through your crotch. I have other leggings that have a diamond pattern sewn around the crotch to avoid the embarrassing "split" look which works well. These would be the absolute best if they fixed that design issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very flattering
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'2", 120lbs and the size small fits me like a glove. I'll have to get used to them being high waisted bc I normally wear low-mid rise, but otherwise they are very comfortable and flattering. The hidden pocket inside fits my galaxy s10e perfectly. Quality fabric, seems well constructed. It does give me a bit of a camel toe but I got them to wear inside so no big deal Edit: no camel toe with thong
customer_reviews.author: Anon_

customer_reviews.title: great gym leggings for a fantastic price
customer_reviews.text: These leggings for the gym are my new best friend. I was always a religious purchaser of Nike products until I got tired of spending $50+ on each pair of leggings. Found these and decided to give it a try, now I own 6! Great for the price, highly recommend. Holds the stomach in during those Zumba classes, and they are lightweight and the sweat doesn’t stay clung to me like in other brands. Bye Nike, will now be buying these! Double good news- they are NOT see through so you don’t have to worry about flashing everyone! For reference, I am 145 pounds, 5 ft 4, 34B, size 6-8.
customer_reviews.author: Gusers

customer_reviews.title: Wow great job
customer_reviews.text: Ok let me say first that these leggings are great I must say there really thick and well made I’m xxl in size there really slimming and great fabric and the customer service for this store is amazing highly professional and I would recommend purchasing from them . I had a issue with my first pair of leggings due to defective but they fixed the issue Im most satisfied will continue to repurchase from this store. Thank you baleaf.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia s.

customer_reviews.title: Different material between the capris and long leggings
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I’m giving these 3 stars is bc it’s not consistent material. I own these in the Capri version and it’s a dead ringer for my Nikes. So I ordered these (same version just longer) and the material is completely different. It’s shiny and much thinner. Also I find it rides up in all the wrong places. These would be fine to work out in. The material feels like it would do really well with sweating but it’s not the material I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: whitneya

customer_reviews.title: Last Resort Leggings
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in these leggings. I’m a size 12 and bought a large. They fit well, and there’s nothing off about the size. They’re a bit long on my 5’5” frame, but don’t look weird rolled up. The construction of them is what I have issues with. The front of leggings had the fabric tag and tag less tag, and the back had the small pocket. Any time I’ve worked out in these it feels like I just sat in a damp chair. They’re quick to smell funky too. Maybe I got a defective pair, but it wasn’t worth it to exchange. These will go in my last resort leggings pile..
customer_reviews.author: EmBro

customer_reviews.title: I love the high waist and the thickness of the fabric
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy. I love the high waist and the thickness of the fabric. Only downside is that the legs are a bit long, but I don't care. 5'8", 165lbs and I bought a large.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gift For You

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for casual wear—love them!
customer_reviews.text: This summer has been atypically hot here in NC, and it dawned on me that exercise clothing with its wicking properties could be a great alternative to my heavier-weight capris (and with comfy spandex would feel like wearing daytime PJs). I looked for a brand/style I had, but couldn’t find it (it had been a few years since I first bought my exercise capris), so I hunted for another option. I pay attention to reviews and items marked Amazon’s Choice, and this one did not disappoint. They fit as comfortably as the brand I had, the sizing was accurate, and I see a second pair in my future.
customer_reviews.author: Donna in NC

customer_reviews.title: but they should fit better over the next few weeks as the baby weight ...
customer_reviews.text: These are now my go-to workout pants! I'm 5'11" and 160 (5 weeks post partum) and ordered medium. They're a touch snug, but they should fit better over the next few weeks as the baby weight comes off. The pants stay in place through movement and don't fall down. They are only slightly see through if stretched a lot and you look really hard, so I'm not worried about it. For the price, you can't beat it! UPDATE: I'm now 140lbs and still love these pants. I wear them pretty frequently and they've held up wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: E. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great tummy control - DO NOT pass squat test
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and high with a very high waist band. I am VERY pleased with the tummy control aspect. However, I will only wear them with a definitely long enough tunic top or dress as they do not pass the squat test. My pair is even a little baggy in my knee and lower thigh, but I do not feel confident leaving any part of my bum exposed. However, for the money, I do like the upper part. I am 5'3 and they are a good length.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Great buy. High quality material, slight compression. Material thick enough to not be see-through. Warmish with a little chill but not heavy. Very complementary fit. I'm 5'8" and the length goes right to middle of my ankles. The high waist stays up through all kinds of movement. I'm a size 16/18 and these fit great and look great.
customer_reviews.author: SassyDIY

customer_reviews.title: Failed the Bend Over and Check in the Mirror Test
customer_reviews.text: Despite the reviews - these are see through :( I held them up to the light before I even tried them on...and knew they would be. Put them on, and yep - very see through. Either they have changed what material they are using. Or all the previous posters didn't do the bend over test. Fit just fine, but that doesn't do me much good if everyone can see my panties.
customer_reviews.author: s&e

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and see through!
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing leggings from this company for years. I have owned 10+ pairs that were always thick, opaque and had great tummy control as advertised. The latest leggings I received from this company were paper thin, see through right out of the box and had absolutely no compression in them at all. From what these leggings used to be to what they are now, you’d get a better pair for $5 at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia I Terwillegar

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! So soft, while still feeling spandex-y enough to work out and stay cool in. The high-waisted fit is my absolute favorite feature, they hit perfectly just above my bellybutton and suck everything in! I am 5'7", 125 pounds, and the Small fits me great. I like yoga/workout pants that are on the snug side, it keeps everything sucked in! They're very comfortable, I've worn them to the gym, the dance studio, and running errands. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Weird fit and pocket placement
customer_reviews.text: The inside pocket makes these leggings a deal breaker. Other expensive and affordable leggings have pockets that are along the seam so that when you place items like a key or a little extra cash in your pocket, it doesn't affect the stream line of the legging. These leggings have a pocket right in the front where it looks like a pooch right in the lower part of the abdomen. It is not figure flattering and actually makes you look a few weeks pregnant. I am disappointed in these leggings.
customer_reviews.author: RN1974

customer_reviews.title: Great quality construction
customer_reviews.text: Baleaf makes great yoga pants. They are thick and not see through at all, hug your curves in a flattering way, and last long. I hand wash mine to help them last longer, just in case. These are not super high waisted, only slightly so, and I don't notice much difference between the waist on these vs. my "non high waisted" Baleafs. The black ones are great. I'd stay away from the dark greys, as I bought them once but the fabric was a different blend & it was not a flattering fit like the black ones are. So thankful this brand exists!
customer_reviews.author: Cautious Shopper

customer_reviews.title: great pants
customer_reviews.text: I love these pants. I ordered them in two colors and both are great. I got the medium (5'5 tall, 145 lbs) and they fit well. the black pair has a slight shine to them, but not to the point of being truly "shiny" like other leggings (which I dislike). The waist comes up high but can be rolled down. I've worn them to hot yoga classes and washed them twice and so far they hold up well. Fabric is on the thin side but not at all sheer. I will probably buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecka

customer_reviews.title: Great fabric!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fabric! It is exactly what I wanted in the fabric, not too thin or thick! The washing instructions indicate handwash only and hang dry. I did actually handwash by hand but now that I bought a two more pair I wash them on delicate cycle and I do put in dryer. The reason being is that I bought the size large and I should have bought size medium. Drying in the dryer shrunk just enough for the fabric to shrink to my needs. Hopefully it won't loose any of the durability of the fabric due to the dryer use.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel931

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: if you would like a camel toe buy this but ifyou would like properly made and sewn product that does not give you intense camel toe then do not buy this. the seams came apart same day i wore them and i have two pairs one is thicker and the other material is thinner but it is the same product so quality control is not important. if you need cheap workout pants then buy it but if you need something to last you forever then do not purchase this at all. regret spending money on this. it really is a hit or miss. good luck.
customer_reviews.author: samiraah09

customer_reviews.title: My new go to
customer_reviews.text: I think Bayleaf is my new workout leggings. I have tried multiple brands and do Fabletics occasionally. I purchased the blue pair but also a fleece lined burgandy. The do not fall down when I run, do sits ups, step class, or weights. They are squat proof. They feel amazing and hold everything in so you are comfortable jumping around without jiggling. In am 5.2 135lbs. Athletic build with short chuncky stubby legs. The small fit me to my liking. If I got the medium there would be no compression. I have washed both 3 times. No fuzz balls on the lining or fading on my bright blue. Great leggings!
customer_reviews.author: angelface

customer_reviews.title: Bummer City
customer_reviews.text: Well, despite washing my cool new dark maroon workout pants with all dark's, on a hand wash cold cycle, after pre-soaking them for 24 hours, and adding color stay booster bs (yes this was the most work I every put into anything), this still managed to totally ruin anything it touched in the wash with BRIGHT NEON PINK PIGMENT THAT WON'T END IT'S LIKE A MARKER! I love the fit of these but this incident was unforgivable. I usually buy several, especially for prime deals, but I previously went with darker shades like black and charcoal. Now, the bargain cost me BIG.
customer_reviews.author: ATG

customer_reviews.title: Sized right, soft like butter
customer_reviews.text: So soft and comfy! I bought two different brands of leggings and these were so much better I returned the other pair immediately. I bought them primarily for long walks and everyday wear. I will definitely buy more of this brand. I bought size L, which is my normal size for stretchy pants, and they were comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cory D. Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Great pants for this plus-sized runner
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these pants! I'm a plus-sized runner (5'2", size 18) and carry most of my weight in my mid-section. I found the size XL to be a perfect fit. They're definitely form fitting, which I like in a running pant, but they're not too tight. I ran in them for the first time today and they did not budge at all! Even with my iPhone 6s in the front pocket, the pants did not move during my run. The phone also fit perfectly into the pocket and was held securely in place. I will definitely be ordering more of these pants.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I really like these pants in the beginning they were really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really like these pants in the beginning they were really comfortable. I only wore them twice and they started coming apart at seams and I ended up with a hole at the seams in the crotch Not made well at all
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Best leggings I’ve ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy! I bought one pair for my mom and she loved them so I got myself some and they’re the best leggings I’ve ever purchased. I’m very tall and mostly legs and the length is almost too long for me which I love! They fit otherwise true to size and I love the comfortable waist band. It doesn’t dig in but it holds. Very stretchy and breathable material too. If I find more colors I’ll buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia G.

customer_reviews.title: Love these capri workout pants!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They are so soft and fit like a glove. Also they stay up well during a tough workout! I am 5’5 130 and I got a medium. Will definitely buy these in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: The inseam is fine - I'm 5'4
customer_reviews.text: These are ok but I don't think I'll buy again. These are thicker pants but they're still see through when bending down. The inseam is fine - I'm 5'4, I ordered a medium and these cover my ankle (I prefer mine a little long). There is a pouch in the front that you can carry cash. It's big enough to fit an iPhone 7+, although I'm not sure why anyone would carry anything somewhat bulky cause it will make your stomach area look bigger. It's a weird placement, but I don't intend on using it anyway. Plus side: they are comfortable, warm, and they don't ride down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but too thin for me
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are super soft and as promised do pass the squat test. I wasn’t able to see the actual fabric of my underwear when bending over. My main issue is that they are fairly thin and you can easily see your panty line and and cellulite. I wish they were a little thicker and maybe had more of a compression element to them. Overall they are very comfortable but I’m returning for something a little thicker that allows me to feel less self conscious when in public.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Nice stretch & length for a tall and curvy gal
customer_reviews.text: These looked small when I first took them out of the package. They have nice stretch and good length (I'm 5'10" & about 240 lbs). The fabric offers some support and smoothing/tummy control, which I like. The pocket is nice sized (I can fit my S6 smart phone in it) but anything with bulk shows as a bump so a person might want to wear a looser long top to cover it. If these wear and wash well I will order again. I do wish they had more colors in my size (xxl), such as a navy heather or the space dye ones.
customer_reviews.author: Tresa R, MN

customer_reviews.title: Stay put, long lasting, my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: (Wife reviewing) I bought a pair of these almost 2 years ago., and just bought my second pair. I wear them for high impact aerobic workouts and they are the only pants that stay up, hold their shape, wash easy, and last! Seriously these babies are bullet proof. 2 years of these tuck-jumping, burpee doing workouts 3 times a week and my first pair is still in good shape. They tuck in the access I've-had-3-kids tummy perfectly. The little logo wore off on the leg but I don't care about that at all. Best workout pants EVER.
customer_reviews.author: PoKeyFam

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, good for workouts or around the house, good value
customer_reviews.text: I got the 2 pack for $36 so $18 per pair and I am very happy with the value. The fabric is thick and not see-through. It's tight, like compression, which I like to my tummy control and it has a high waist and wide waistband. The stitching feels sturdy and they've held up in the wash so far. I did notice the price went up, I'm guessing due to demand, but overall I really liked these and would consider buying more. I'm 5'4'' 135 and post-baby, I ordered a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5'3" 125lbs, it's a nope
customer_reviews.text: Do you have bumps and dimples? Get ready to show them to the world! I'm 5'3" and 125lbs and ordered a small. I'm not by any means a big girl, but I've battled cellulite since high school. It's minor, but EXTREMELY visible in these. There isn't enough fabric in the rear to accommodate a larger backside making it pull the back of my waistline down. A size larger would make the waist to big. My other yoga pants are softer, thicker, and provide much more modesty. If you're pear shaped with minor imperfections, I wouldnt recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Best Yoga Pant Ever
customer_reviews.text: These yoga pants are the absolute best! The pants are comfortable, provide a nice amount of compression without feeling restrictive, and wash nicely. The pants did not fade, pull, pill, or lose shape after 30+ washes. I wash them on cold, permanent press, and hang dry. I ordered a few pairs of these pants now in fill length and calf length. I really enjoy wearing these pants and think the brand is fantastic. I enjoyed this product so much I also purchased rash guard shirts.
customer_reviews.author: LEG 585

customer_reviews.title: Not high rise
customer_reviews.text: Needed leggings in a pinch and went with these based on all of the positive reviews. They arrived dirty and looked like they had been tried on before. I am barely 5'5" and these are NOT high rise. They didn't even come close to my bellybutton. I have a flat stomach and this waistband still found a way to give me a muffin top. If you love having a camel toe these are the pants for you. If you are used to alo, adam selman, koral, lulu, etc..do NOT buy these. The fabric feels cheap and itchy. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: GGTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: At 5foot 5inches these sit slightly lower than mid-calf & have a nice high waist that holds in the upper belly bulge. XXXL fits 46 inch waist, 60 inch hips, 34 inch thigh, 23 inch calf. Washed 3 times, worn twice and haven't heard any threads pop so they feel pretty well made so far. The fabric feels soft and thick. Comfortable enough to walk do yoga or sleep in & the legs stay put without cutting off your circulation. The pocket is awesome & fits my moto G7 perfectly. I liked these enough to buy another pair. Please offer more colors in this style!
customer_reviews.author: GMW

customer_reviews.title: Size down, Not that much tummy control...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because I couldn't get the 90 Degree Reflex in Capri length. I usually order a large in 90 Degree so after reading the reviews went with a large for these. Upon taking them out of the package I knew immediately that I should have ordered the medium. These are not as slimming as the other brand and definitely not in the tummy area, which as a 40+ woman having had multiple pregnancies, I really want. They are also a little more see through than the Reflex leggings. I'll wear these for hanging out at home, but I won't buy them again. I wear a size 12 jeans and buy large in other brands.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great leggings and will buy more
customer_reviews.text: I bought these leggings for my trip to WDW from a YouTuber recommendation. These leggings held up so nicely and they were very comfortable throughout the whole trip with miles of walking in the heat. Unfortunately, I forgot to follow the guided recommendations for washing and some pilling in the groin area has occurred. However, these leggings are still amazing, have no holes, are not see through and feel so comfortable on!
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Totally sheer but soft
customer_reviews.text: I’m an athletic 5’8”, 150lbs and based on reviews I ordered a large, they fit fairly well, fitted but weren’t compressed by any means. My biggest hang up with these were even not being too tight, there were completely sheer when barely bending over, NOT squat proof at all, I wouldn’t even be able to bend down quickly to grab something without fear of totally flashing someone. The reason I gave it 2 stars is because the material is super soft! But I would not recommend these for working out.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: My favorite means of motivation
customer_reviews.text: This brand has become a favorite. Purchased different sizes for family. They do not slip and slide except when I mistakenly wore the someone else’s which was a different size. Compared these with a pair of Champions-which slid down when I sat or bending. It is tedious to need to pull up one’s pants each time you stand. So, wearing Baleaf has caused more appreciation, no need to adjust these when moving about. They stay in place. They are so comfortable that I want to wear them daily, which motivates me to go work out. Even on non-workout days, I wear with long tees or tunics.
customer_reviews.author: La Smurf

customer_reviews.title: TRY THEM! You'll never buy from any other brand again
customer_reviews.text: I use to be a devout 90 degrees by reflex legging lover. I tried these on a whim and I'm never turning back. The material is the winner here. Totally opaque deep black - no sheen like you see in some leggings- and it's a perfect combo of compression and flexibility. Because of the fabric the fit is amazing. There is NO pinch at the waist, when wearing it just is seamless. the high waist is perfect for those love handles.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Seefeldt

customer_reviews.title: Good good good all around good- treat yo self
customer_reviews.text: Baleaf never disappoints. They’re the only leggings that I’ve kept for multiple years. I have multiple Baleaf styles but these ones are great. Do you have a pair of pants that you wear that make you feel great and make your day better? These are those pants for me. They’re the first things I grab out of the hamper after I do laundry. I have size XL and I’m 5’7” and 203lbs (sz 16) and they fit perfectly. They DO split at the seems at the top of your thighs! But, they’re so comfy I think it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Erika H

customer_reviews.title: Will show sweat
customer_reviews.text: I love the color the material is definitely moisture w buttttt bc of the color and type of fabric if you sweat in these it will be obvious and since I want to use them for walking and running in the Florida heat I don’t want butt sweat marks while I run around my neighborhood saying hello to lol my neighbors. However when it gets cooler out these may be nice to wear around so I’m keeping them mainly bc the color is super cute. I’d try these in a different color but I’m really looking for something that doesn’t make it obv my booty is working up a serious sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Ivadell

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: These are seriously my favorite! I weigh 155, 28" waist and 41 inches in my hips/butt area, with 22% Body fat. I could wear a medium or a large. I got a medium in these, and a Large in the Capri's The Capri's in the medium stay where they need to, and are my go-to gym capri's. These pants I wear all the time, and have held up well through the washes I like how the help "hold-in" my little pouch, so I can wear a little tighter shirts without feeling self-counscious
customer_reviews.author: Carissa

customer_reviews.title: Just put ‘em on and Your body smooths it all out
customer_reviews.text: Perfect thickness. You feel caressed by these pants . You never feel half-naked! They bend with you and Allow you full movement in all direction. If you “ got it” it’s gonna show your beauty. If something’s missing, these pants will Smooth over all the funny little bits. Not quite sprayed on, and they are forgiving where they need to be... no camel’s toes or show off “ oh look at me! I’m so slender! , but the lines created are long and modestly fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: Wondertrout

customer_reviews.title: Thick, durable and good price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these early last year so this review is a bit late, but relevant since one star was docked for wear & tear. These pants are really great- very comfortable, but slimming. They definitely ‘lift & smooth’ everything in and make the rush looking rounded and high. I am deducting one star because the side seam started to come undone after a few months of wearing and washing, but the hole was an easy fix. The only thing that would make these perfect is a change to the inseam. They are closer to maybe 32”, if they were a tad shorter they would be perfect for me. For now I just cuff them and enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: daria2189

customer_reviews.title: Buttery soft fabric but China based company
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand but won’t buy again knowing it is a Chinese company. Have skorts, shirts and now 2 pair of capris. At 5’4 155# I cannot tell the difference between the medium and large. They stretch and cover beautifully. Waist is solid and does not roll. Could use for hot yoga but not sure what the wick point is so wear casually. I’m a LuluLemon girl for yoga but cannot beat the price for quality casual wear.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: Really love these leggings. They're thick without being too heavy, so they absolutely pass the squat test. The pockets are very handy and make walking or jogging with my phone a lot easier. My one tiny complaint is that the medium is a tad too big for me, yet the small seems too small. Both feel fine though and I'm happy. Just make sure w the small you're wearing seamless underwear or a thing. Other than that, for the price these are really great! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Birdie

customer_reviews.title: sizing chart is a lie
customer_reviews.text: the fit on these are horrendous. i am never anything other than a medium in leggings, and when i got these MEDIUM leggings, they fit like an XXS. couldn't even get them past my knee!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they run a bit on the small side
customer_reviews.text: These fit on the small side, especially if you a little bit of a tummy. I could of worn a medium easily except they would of been way too long since I’m only 5’5. Other than that, I love them, the material is soft and comfy not to mention the right side phone pocket is very convenient! I’ll be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Barbij

customer_reviews.title: A favorite
customer_reviews.text: At 5' 5" 150 lbs pear shape, large was maybe a tiny bit big, but right for me as I don't like anything too tight. Medium probably would have worked but probably would have given muffin top. Wore these around the house all day doing chores. Comfortable. Good waist line, stays up well even being a little big. Fabric thickness is good and breathable. Stitching needs better quality control for loose ends, but holds up so far. Pockets are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A favorite
customer_reviews.text: At 5' 5" 150 lb pear shape these were a little big but right for me because I don't like anything too tight. Medium probably would have worked but probably would have had a muffin top. I like the v-shaped front. I wore these around the house all day doing chores. Comfortable. Fabric is thick enough and breathable. Waist stayed up well. Pockets are nice. Stitching could have used a bit better quality control but is holding up so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, not long enough
customer_reviews.text: This review is only for other tall girls out there. These seem like excellent leggings, but if you're tall like me (6 ft), these will not be ankle-length. They stopped about 4 inches above my ankle. This would be fine just for working out, but I wanted something versatile to also wear as "pants" under tunics and dresses. Unfortunately, these won't work for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one, it fit great. Then I ordered a second! High waisted, so no muffin top, the logo is high enough that a longer tunic style top covers it, so you can wear for a nice casual look besides a workout. Fabric is not see thru and it has a little pocket area in the waistband for ID or keys. I am 5'3" and 145, the large fits me nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Lesa

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The best legging I’ve ever purchased and yes I’ve got many.. will buy again, will only buy this brand. I’m extremely happy.. ladies go for it.. the waist band is everything.. tummy coverage, flattens and hold.. extremely well made..
customer_reviews.author: Fefe

customer_reviews.title: Good yoga pants
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pairs of yoga pants- one with the mesh on the side of the leg and one pair of plain black. I am 5’5 and about 145lbs. I purchased both in size large. I typically wear a size medium. The mesh size large fit pretty snug. I’m glad I went with the large versus the medium on these. The large size in the plain black color fit drastically differently. They are comfortable in the legs, but they are a little bit loose in the waist. Overall, these are nice yoga pants so far. They are thick and soft, and seem to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: dogmom

customer_reviews.title: Great Leggings
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our Alaska trip/cruise .... they were perfect! I'm 5'7/ approx 150-153lbs with well defined hips,calves and thighs (no thigh gap) -I bought the XL & the length/fit were perfect for me... no riding down & no problem in any range of movement. We fished, hiked, & walked ALOT before catching a cruise back. We were in Alaska for about 3 weeks so I've only washed them a few times but no problems with seams or pilling. For the $$, I consider these to be a great buy & I will definitely buy more!
customer_reviews.author: NannyInTexas

customer_reviews.title: Great workout capris. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable workout capris. I would say they fit a little small as I thought the medium might be a big baggie and they are almost snug. The waist is very tight getting on as mentioned in other reviews but once over the hips, fits great. And I do like that it is snug and doesn't gap during a workout. Pants are not see through, easy to move in, very comfortable. I went back to order another pair but they were sold out of my size (would still get medium again). Will definitely buy again. I am only giving it 4 stars because I think the size is a bit off and if everyone gets 5 stars... what's the point.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Work Out Leggings!
customer_reviews.text: New favorite work out leggings! I had previously been devoted to Baleaf Women's Ankle Legging Inner Pocket Non See-through - but these ones sit a bit higher on the stomach, and if your tummy conscious like me you understand the value in that. I can wear these and a lower cut tank top that might flow around while jumping/moving in the gym without worrying about my stomach showing the whole time. Will definitely be buying these in every color! And probably a couple to spare in black :)Also - the pocket will actually fit a smart phone if you need it to! (For reference - I bought Medium - 5'5 140 lbs)
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like them
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to enjoy these leggings but I got sent the wrong size twice. On the package there was a medium sticker with barcode on one side and the other side had the large sticker with barcode and they sent me a large when I ordered a medium. The large actually fit ok but they were a little long and loose. I loved the texture of the leggings and if I had the right size I’m sure they would have been amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: Worst pants and worst company to deal with!!! I bought them in March, they didn’t fit, so I tried to return them and I’m still dealing with the return process... it’s June. Nightmare!!! Stick with American Eagle and Fabletics- SO MUCH BETTER than this garbage!! Still waiting on my refund, Whom-Ever-The-Heck-Runs-This-Mess. I’m 5’6” and 160 lbs (honestly ;)) and the large was WAY too small.... I would size up at least two sizes. The little fabric that did touch my skin, felt like I was wearing a screen from my window.
customer_reviews.author: TeeEee

customer_reviews.title: So Cute- But Pet Hair Magnet
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY reason I'm not giving these a five star is because they attract the most pet hair out of anything I own and it's hard to lint roll it off. The fit is adorable and I love the mesh, but they are a pet hair magnet, unlike any other workout pants I own. While that was disappointing, the pants themselves are fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Value - Exceeded Expectation
customer_reviews.text: These are my FAVORITE yoga pants. I am a size 16 pants and I wear an XXL in these. They are truly high wasted and they are not see through at all. I do ballet barre 2-3 times a week and yoga twice a week; I've had these for months now with no signs of wear. I am pear shaped and these fit me great. I have these in every color I could get in stock and I cannot wait to try the pants and skorts! (I was not paid to write this review... I just really love these pants and this brand)
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Purvis

customer_reviews.title: I love Baleaf leggings
customer_reviews.text: These are a different material than my black pants. I love this brand. I am 5'7", about 175 pounds with a big butt and smaller waist and I never find leggings that fit in store. The size L fits snuggly but well. XL might be more comfortable but slips too much during yoga and it gets annoying pulling them up. I really like the charcoal color and material for casual wear but would recommend the black or dark magenta (the only other colors I have) for exercise since they feel stretchier. The high waist is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: These are great leggings. The material js soft and comfortable, and it disnt react funny after being washed and dried. The high rise keeps things "contained", and they aren't at all see through (even if I bend over, still can't see the goods). They are very warm, which has made them quite versatile. I recently wore them under snow pants (that didn't have insulation) and I was pretty toasty. I'm 5'3", size 8, and found the large a good fit to accommodate my meaty legs. They were an inch or two too long, but I prefer them that way.
customer_reviews.author: Thoughtful Customer

customer_reviews.title: New favorite leggings
customer_reviews.text: When my favorite leggings ripped, I thought my life was over. But i looked at the material tag and saw that they were 90% nylon and 10% spandex and i set out to find a pair of leggings made of the same material. When i found these, i was hoping they would be the same. They did not disappoint me, in fact they went above and beyond. These leggings are my perfect everyday leggings that double as gym/workout leggings, they are thick and durable and tight and not see through. Definitely squat proof. I’m so happy I found new favorite leggings, and I’m going to order another pair too. I love these.
customer_reviews.author: lina

customer_reviews.title: Good choice.
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of these pants! They are a little on the thicker side but they are not see through at all. They move well with your body as you are running or doing other workouts. The color is really pretty too. Few things to take note of, 1. When you sweat it is extremely obvious, 2. They are tight but stretch well (maybe purchase a size up if you are concerned about tightness), 3. The high waist is nice but it digs into your skin a bit (again, maybe buy a size up). Overall, I will be using these for running and yoga vs at the gym or during kickboxing.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Not Flattering, Low Waist
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed with these capris, I had bought a black & grey pair. Neither are as flattering as other capris I have and they are NOT high waisted. I am constantly pulling up the black pair’s waist & the grey barely stays put. I unfortunately bought them & kept them for nicer weather so I was too late to return them, my bad that I will not repeat again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Cheap leggings, save your money
customer_reviews.text: I tried to be adventurous and order leggings from Amazon. I found these to be awkwardly and cheaply fitting. Material feels heavy and not breathable. I ordered an XL and normally do wear XL in leggings (and size 12/14 jeans) but these were awkwardly big in the crotch and ill-fitting. I am returning them. FYI I ordered a large too and of course they were too small.
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The good part: the waistband stays up during a yoga class and does not roll down like many of my leggings. The bad: I don't find these to be soft at all, and they start bagging around my knees and upper thighs about 10 minutes into my workout. I'm 5'3" and 132 lbs, and wear a Small in Athleta and GapFit which are my favorites. I purchased the navy color in these Baleaf leggings, size Small, and the quality is close to Old Navy or Target brands. I've washed them once and I saw no improvement.
customer_reviews.author: SarahJane

customer_reviews.title: For the price, these are good enough.
customer_reviews.text: These are leggings. For the price you're paying, they are good enough. Spandex content is acceptable, but after wearing the leggings for a couple of hours, I noticed them starting to sag. Fit is average: Not too tight, not too loose. Not so thick that I expect these will last a long time. Summary: good enough.
customer_reviews.author: hoppy

customer_reviews.title: Great Workout/Yoga pant!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, high waist is back! Just in time for my aging tummy! A few kids, weight loss, weight gain and not enough core strengthening and the tummy tire doesn't hide itself like it used to! I found these pants to be very flattering and comfortable. My only complaint is the during fitness class that requires I rapidly alter from the floor to standing then back to the floor, the waist of the pant will come down a bit in the front. Honestly, I don't think it is the pants but my tummy. I'm 5'3 and 190#, usually a 14-16 in clothing and I purchased these in XL, black. Great backside coverage when I bend, too!
customer_reviews.author: Tenacious P

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty nice quality actually. The leggings have a nice feel to them and they look nice. My only complaint is that they were slightly tighter in the tummy than I would have liked. I’m 5 feet 2 inches and weight around 120 pounds and I ordered a small. I have a little bit of a tumny but it doesn’t usually cause many issues. These leggings make me have a little bit of skin/fat squish out of the top and generally become uncomfortable if I wear them for too long. If I would have bought a medium they would have been too big. Other than the tummy issue I think this is a pretty solid pair of leggings.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Q.

customer_reviews.title: Great pants for yoga and casual wear
customer_reviews.text: I am a 5'5" and 147 pounds and athletic female. I am true size 10. I definitely have muscles on my legs and I am not very thin, but without much extra. I am comfortably fit in size M of this leggings. I love the color and the texture. The texture is not slippery inside or outside which means that the pants will stay put and the yoga shirt would cling to them and will not ride up in down dog. I would recommend this pants for sport and casual wear. I am going to order some more.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I never write review because everything is more or less fine but I wanted these leggings to be perfect. I love the material. I love the color. I love the length. I’m 5’8 and often small size leggings are too short on me. The only drawback is the pocket placement on these pants. It’s like a pouch type thing on the inside of the front of the waist which doesn’t allow the waist to sit perfectly flat. If that issue gets fixed I will buy these in every color. The price is really good for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Morse

customer_reviews.title: I use these for work, not working out.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for work, not working out. I’m a massage therapist, and I can definitely say these stretch and move with the body. The reason for four stars instead of five is because they fit small. I normally wear a medium, but the very top of the waistband felt like it was too tight. So I ordered a large and though the waistband fits perfectly now, the legs are no longer as snug as I would prefer. However, they do still fit snug enough to look like they’re supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: BookFaerie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice yoga capris
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the thickness of these yoga pants. Ordered a size S for size 2-4 petite pants and they fit perfectly. Good quality for the price and they're not see through. Ordered a charcoal color and they're a tiny bit lighter than a dark charcoal, but the color is really nice. The length is perfect for someone petite. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Powerpuffed

customer_reviews.title: True to size and truly great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, ordered my regular size 2XL in black and they are true to size. These leggings have held up well in my cross fit classes AND they are thick enough fabric that they do not show through! The waist stays in place and does not roll down my tummy like many workout leggings do. Very minimal pilling in the area between my legs. These are great quality because they wear very well. I purchased mine 8 months ago and just ordered my 2nd pair can't wait til they arrive!
customer_reviews.author: BCW

customer_reviews.title: Amazing workout capris
customer_reviews.text: Stays in place and is very flattering. I wear for spin class and lifting and they are amazing. FYI sizing wise for a 5’4 woman they go to mid calf. At 200lbs get the x large (16/18), at 175 (12/14) get the large now at 155 (8/10) I need the mediums. Riding it out until I hit 145 though. Still works for me but starting to get baggy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good! I’ll keep them!
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty hood compression leggings. They do have seems on the outside, as I they aren’t perfect for wearing as d as ily leggings, but they offer good compression without overdoing it. True black. They have lettering near the waist band which I don’t like, but my shirts will usually cover that up. As long as they hold up, I’d buy them again. I will update this review if they don’t.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Best leggings in years
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute, so comfortable, and so practical. Thank you for the reasonable high waist (no low rise). The deep leg pockets are Brilliant. I walked all over India in these leggings, with my keys, money, and camera in the leg pockets so my hands were free. The colors and variety these come in are fantastic. Thank you, I love these. Buying more they are so good.
customer_reviews.author: C. Inglese

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered after watching a Youtube review. I needed more squat proof pants that didn't cost 50$ + AND THESE ARE IT. My only negative is that it gives me camel toe (which I fix just by sticking a light liner in my thong, protip) because there is no crotch gusset sewn in, it's just a straight seam. Still give them a 9/10, especially for the price! I'll definitely be buying more colors!
customer_reviews.author: ffk

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I got these in the mail this morning and took one look at them and thought, "Yikes, these are tiny and are never going to fit." I ordered a large, and am 185 pounds. However, I tried them and they fit great. No binding feeling anywhere. They make me look great (YES!) and they feel awesome. I feel very covered up, as the fabric looks thick and retains its color (denim) even though it feels thin. I think I'm going to be spending a lot of time in these leggings!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie1949

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, runs small.
customer_reviews.text: Material is plenty thick enough. Not see through. Probably not idea for summer (at least here in the desert). The issue is these are really small. Length is great, however. I am 5'8" and 130 lbs and the medium is too small for me. If you have no hips, it will work. But if your hips are 38-40 inches, I'd recommend sizing up.
customer_reviews.author: Sonoran Woman

customer_reviews.title: I'm the biggest Baleaf fan but this was a fail
customer_reviews.text: I love Baleaf leggings and running shorts. I recommend them to everyone but these were not good. First, the pockets are so much smaller than previous leggings. I can't fit my phone in either the upper or lower pocket. But worst of all, when I went running I kept having to pull up the pants because they kept slipping down. I will still try to find the old type of Baleaf pants because they are so awesome, but these are getting returned
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: BALEAF Women's 20" / 28" High Waisted Yoga Leggings Workout Capri Tummy Control Pants with Pocket(Plus Size/Regular)
feature_bullets: Moisture-wicking, breathable and stretchy fabric provides complete coverage
Anti-drop, high-rise, wide waistband for no muffin top and maximum coverage
Hidden waistband pocket for stashing your key or card
A gusset crotch to maximize free movement and interlock seams to minimize rubbing and chafing
Perfect for yoga, running, exercise, fitness, indoor and outdoor, any type of workout, or casual wear
